text: Veruyushchiye muzhchiny i zhenshchiny yavlyayutsya pomoshchnikami i druz'yami drug drugu. Oni velyat sovershat' odobryayemoye i zapreshchayut predosuditel'noye, sovershayut namaz, vyplachivayut zakyat, povinuyutsya Allakhu i Yego Poslanniku. Allakh smilostivitsya nad nimi. Voistinu, Allakh - Mogushchestvennyy, Mudryy
